card.name: Acquisition Cat
card.rules: First strike Whenever this creature attacks, create a tapped 1/1 blue Fish creature token for each attacking Cat you control. 1, Sacrifice a Fish, Rat, or Bird: Put a +1/+1 counter on target Cat.

card.name: Alberiusâ€™ Memorial
card.rules: Create a 4/4 white Angel creature token with flying for each creature that died under your control this turn. Cycling 1W (1W, Discard this card: Draw a card.)
card.flavor: â€œA great man who revived a great cause, and who believe in a great future for our great people.â€ â€” Etha, leader of the watch

card.name: Angel of Collections
card.rules: Flying, protection from black (This creature canâ€™t be blocked, targeted, dealt damage, enchanted, or equipped by anything black.) W, Tap an untapped creature you control: Tap target untapped creature. W, Remove a stun counter from a creature you control: Put a stun counter on target tapped creature.

card.name: Anointed Healer
card.rules: As long as youâ€™re divine, this creature gets +1/+1 and has lifelink. Divinity (WUBRG: You become divine for the rest of the game. Activate only as a sorcery.)
card.flavor: The mummified servant class remained subservient as ever, disturbing visitors.

card.name: Appeal to Life
card.rules: Choose target permanent card in your graveyard that was put there from the battlefield this turn. Return it to the battlefield tapped. Cycling 1W (1W, Discard this card: Draw a card.)
card.flavor: Everyone saw something for themselves in the religious order, but Alberiusâ€™ focus was singular: return the dead back to the world of the living.

card.name: Basriâ€™s Supervision
card.rules: Put a +1/+1 counter on each of up to two target creatures. If either had a stun counter on it, draw a card.
card.flavor: Basri knew how to lead a group. What once took weeks of preparation for the devoted now took only days.

card.name: Beast of the Mirage
card.rules: When this creature enters, return up to one other target creature you control to its ownerâ€™s hand. 1W, Tap an untapped Desert you control: Exile this creature, then return it to the battlefield tapped under its ownerâ€™s control.
card.flavor: By body mass, the majority of the desertâ€™s ecosystem was camels and beetles.

card.name: Cloud Drift
card.rules: Exile target creature you control, then return it to the battlefield under its ownerâ€™s control. Cycling 2W (2W, Discard this card: Draw a card.) When you cycle Cloud Drift, exile up to one target creature you control. Return it to the battlefield under its ownerâ€™s control at the beginning of the next end step.

card.name: Earthen Retribution
card.rules: Earthen Retribution deals 3 damage to target attacking or blocking creature. If you control a Desert or thereâ€™s a Desert card in your graveyard, it deals 4 damage to that creature instead. Cycling 1W (1W, Discard this card: Draw a card.)

card.name: Encase in Sand
card.rules: When this enchantment enters, exile target creature an opponent controls until this enchantment leaves the battlefield. When this enchantment enters, if you control a Desert or thereâ€™s a Desert card in your graveyard, surveil 2. (Look at the top two cards of your library, then put any number of them into your graveyard and the rest on top of your library in any order.)

card.name: Furnish the Dead
card.rules: Create a 2/2 black Zombie creature token with decayed, then you may attach an Equipment you control to it. (It canâ€™t block. When it attacks, sacrifice it at end of combat.) Flashback 2W (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)
card.flavor: As Tezzeret rounded up the Anointed, he took to augmenting their form for better performance much like his old master once had.

card.name: Gauntlets of Banishing
card.rules: Husk (When this enters, create a 2/2 black Zombie creature token with decayed, then attach this to it. A creature with decayed canâ€™t block. card.name: Glittering Carapace

card.name: Gluttonous Feline
card.rules: Whenever this creature attacks, you may put a stun counter on it. If you do, you gain 2 life. (If a permanent with a stun counter would become untapped, remove one from it instead.) Cycling 2W (2W, Discard this card: Draw a card.)

card.name: Guardian Devotee
card.rules: When this creature dies, scry 1. Then draw a card if youâ€™re divine. (To scry 1, look at the top card of your library. You may put that card on the bottom of your library.) Divinity (WUBRG: You become divine for the rest of the game. Activate only as a sorcery.)
card.flavor: Not all at Khnum were fueled by religious fervor, but they all felt a kinship with themselves.

card.name: Harrier of Dark Skies
card.rules: Flash Flying Cycling 1W (1W, Discard this card: Draw a card.) When you cycle Harrier of Dark Skies, tap up to two target creatures without flying.
card.flavor: â€œHear the winged call, desertâ€™s hold befallâ€

card.name: Horde Mastermind
card.rules: When this creature enters, put three +1/+1 counters on target Zombie you control. Whenever a Zombie you control dies during your turn, if it had counters on it, put those counters on another target Zombie you control.
card.flavor: Cowed into silence following Bolasâ€™ downfall, the wranglers of the dead returned to follow Tezzeret after his ascent.

card.name: Khnum Evangel

card.name: Khnum-Bane Retriever

card.flavor: While the assault was led by the degenerated gods, most of the combat was between bands of Anointed soldiers.

card.name: Makhrehi, Tairinâ€™s Speaker
card.rules: As long as you control a God creature, creatures canâ€™t attack you or planeswalkers you control unless their controller pays 1 for each creature they control thatâ€™s attacking you.

card.name: Oketraâ€™s Might
card.rules: Consecrate 3WW (You may cast this spell by sacrificing a creature and paying its Consecrate cost reduced by that creatureâ€™s power. If you do, put this spell onto the battlefield transformed as it resolves.) Create three 1/1 white Human Soldier creature tokens.

card.name: Regnant Sandseer
card.rules: Flying As long as youâ€™re divine, your opponents canâ€™t cast more than one spell each turn. Divinity (WUBRG: You become divine for the rest of the game. Activate only as a sorcery.)
card.flavor: While humans and khenra flocked to false idols, the Aven believed in a greater power.

card.name: Sickle of Accursed Sorrow
card.rules: Husk (When this enters, create a 2/2 black Zombie creature token with decayed, then attach this to it. A creature with decayed canâ€™t block. When it attacks, sacrifice it at end of combat.) Equipped creature gets +3/+3 and has flying and vigilance. Equipâ€”Pay 2 and sacrifice equipped creature. Equip 6

card.name: Summon the Sands
card.rules: Target creature gets +1/+1 and gains flying until end of turn. Remove any number of stun counters from among creatures you control.
card.flavor: Rather than be bound by the sandstorms surrounding the city, some opted to try and control them; some even succeeded.

card.name: Terror of the Wastes
card.rules: Flying Ward 2 (Whenever this creature becomes the target of a spell or ability an opponent controls, counter it unless that player pays 2.) Cycling 1W (1W, Discard this card: Draw a card.)
card.flavor: Once obscured by the Hekma, now the citizens of Naktamun can see untold horrors peaking out from behind the numerous desert sandstorms.

card.name: Vizier of Construction
card.rules: When this creature enters, look at the top four cards of your library. You may reveal an artifact card from among them and put it into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order. 1, T: Put your choice of a brick counter or a charge counter on target artifact. Activate only as a sorcery.

card.name: Warrior of Wrapped Wings
card.rules: Flying Whenever this creature attacks, you may put a stun counter on it. When you do, put a +1/+1 counter on target creature with a stun counter on it. (If a permanent with a stun counter would become untapped, remove one from it instead.)
card.flavor: In life renowned warriors, the many Anointed were put to use in the battle among cities.

card.name: Witness to Conflict
card.rules: Flying Whenever this creature attacks, untap target attacking creature.
card.flavor: Angels had served to imprison the people of Amonkhet for generations, and the newest conflict gave them no guidance on sides to take.

card.name: Atemsisâ€™ Keeper
card.rules: Flying Whenever you discard a nonland card, you may return target creature with lesser mana value than the discarded card to its ownerâ€™s hand. Do this only once each turn. Whenever you discard a land card, you may draw a card. Do this only once each turn.

card.name: Become Mirage
card.rules: Target creature becomes a black Horror with base power and toughness 4/4 until end of turn. If youâ€™ve discarded a card this turn, you may instead have it become a green Snake with base power and toughness 1/1 until end of turn. Draw a card.

card.name: Cavern Seer
card.rules: When this creature enters, look at the top three cards of your library. You may reveal a noncreature. nonland card from among them and put it into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in any order.
card.flavor: Some things canâ€™t be seen in sunlight.

card.name: Challenge Belief
card.rules: Counter target spell unless its controller pays X. Cycling 3U (3U, Discard this card: Draw a card.) When you cycle Challenge Belief, if an opponent controls more lands than you, draw a card.

card.name: Consult the Texts
card.rules: At the beginning of your first main phase, draw a card, then discard a card unless youâ€™re divine. Divinity (WUBRG: You become divine for the rest of the game. Activate only as a sorcery.)

card.name: Desertâ€™s Rejection

card.name: Diviner of the Hidden Path

card.name: Drake Summoning

card.name: Heavenly Recounter

card.name: Kefnetâ€™s Might

card.name: Nightmare Stalker

card.name: Plead to the Gods

card.name: Ravenous Sandwhale

card.name: Retrieve Valuables
card.rules: Draw three cards, then discard two cards.

card.name: Silver-Clad Seer
card.rules: Whenever this creature attacks, you may put a stun counter on it. (Look at the top two cards of your library, then put any number of them on the bottom and the rest on top in any order.)

card.name: Suppress Innovation

card.name: Abandon

card.name: Angel of Debts

B, Sacrifice a creature you control: Target creature gets -1/-1 until end of turn. B, Sacrifice a creature you control with toughness less than its base toughness: Exile target creature.

card.name: Archfiend of Deceit

card.name: Barren Desiccator

card.name: Bloodletter Battlewing

card.name: Bolasâ€™ Shadow
card.rules: Enchant player When this Curse enters, enchanted player discards two cards unless they discard a nonland card. Whenever enchanted player discards a card, they lose 2 life and you gain 2 life.

card.name: Bontuâ€™s Might

card.name: Curse of Wandering

card.rules: Enchant creature Enchanted creature has decayed. (It canâ€™t block. When it attacks, sacrifice it at end of combat.) When enchanted creature dies, draw a card.
card.flavor: Usually, you lose yourself before you lose your arms.

card.name: Gulfieldâ€™s Tyranny
card.rules: Target opponent reveals their hand. You choose a nonland card from it. That player discards that card. Create a 2/2 black Zombie creature token with decayed. (It canâ€™t block. When it attacks, sacrifice it at end of combat.)

(Exile the creature card and pay its mana cost: Create a token thatâ€™s a copy of it, except itâ€™s white and it has no mana cost. Activate only as a sorcery.)

card.name: Parasitic Cadaver

card.flavor: â€œWhy do the Accursed hunger in their unusual state, having no need for food? Perhaps it truly is a punishment.â€

card.name: Remnant of Affliction
card.rules: Whenever this creature becomes blocked, defending player loses 2 life.
card.flavor: â€œI saw him. Aptera, outside the city walls. I know it was him â€” he bore his crest upon his chest. They said he still lived, that they were searching...â€

card.name: Rotting Greatwurm

card.rules: Menace (This creature canâ€™t be blocked except by two or more creatures.) 3B, Sacrifice another creature: This creature gains indestructible until end of turn. Tap it.

card.name: Speaker of the Anointed

card.name: Badlands Madcap

card.name: Burning-Heart Assaulter

card.flavor: â€œThey say you can train for years and years and remain the same, then in single day of strife be born anew.â€

card.name: Chandraâ€™s Mistake
card.rules: Chandraâ€™s Mistake deals 6 damage to target creature or planeswalker. Discard a card at random, then draw a card.
card.flavor: Realizing she could never undo the damage caused by her mistake and witnessing the destruction at Naktamun, Chandra let her grief speak.

card.name: Desanctify
card.rules: Destroy target nonbasic land. Desanctify deals 1 damage to that landâ€™s controller for each color that land could produce. Cycling 1R (1R, Discard this card: Draw a card.)
card.flavor: To say such events were righteous acts of divine punishment is unfalsifiable, but the evidence speaks for itself.

card.name: Devout Warcaller
card.rules: Trample At the beginning of your second main phase, if youâ€™re divine, untap each creature you control that attacked this turn. After this main phase, there is an additional combat phase followed by an additional main phase. Divinity (WUBRG: You become divine for the rest of the game. Activate only as a sorcery.)

card.name: Erupt
card.rules: Target creature gets +3/+1 until end of turn. Cycling 1R (1R, Discard this card: Draw a card.)
card.flavor: â€œYears ago, I failed to save my family from the Devastation. I wonâ€™t fail to save my new family.â€

card.name: Flamespeaker Khenra
card.rules: When this creature enters while youâ€™re divine or you become divine for the first time, it deals 2 damage to any target. Divinity (WUBRG: You become divine for the rest of the game. Activate only as a sorcery.)
card.flavor: Years of nonviolence were shattered when the Order of Flame was called upon in defense of the city.

card.name: Glimpse a Better World
card.rules: Add five mana in any combination of colors. Spend this mana only to activate abilities or to cast planeswalker spells. Cycling 1R (1R, Discard this card: Draw a card.)
card.flavor: Though merely an illusion, planting the idea of paradise is enough to convince most.

card.name: Glory Dominus
card.rules: Flying, haste Whenever this creature attacks, you may put a stun counter on it. When you do, it deals 1 damage to each creature and planeswalker your opponents control. (If a permanent with a stun counter would become untapped, remove one from it instead.)
card.flavor: â€œBehold the dragonâ€™s glory.â€ â€” Expression meaning â€œface consequencesâ€

card.name: Grizzled Tomb Raider
card.rules: First strike Whenever this creature attacks, you may put a stun counter on it. If you do, whenever this creature deals combat damage to a player this turn, create a Treasure token.
card.flavor: â€œRespect for the dead? Iâ€™ve seen their mummified bodies lurching around â€” they donâ€™t see to have much respect for me!â€

card.name: Hazoret, the Returned
card.rules: Indestructible As long as youâ€™re divine, Hazoret gets +5/+0 and has haste. Discard a card: Add one mana of any color. Divinity (WUBRG: You become divine for the rest of the game. Activate only as a sorcery.)

card.name: Hazoretâ€™s Might
card.rules: Consecrate 3RR (You may cast this spell by sacrificing a creature and paying its Consecrate cost reduced by that creatureâ€™s power. If you do, put this spell onto the battlefield transformed as it resolves.) Gain control of target creature until end of turn. Untap that creature. It gets +2/+0 and gains haste until end of turn.

card.name: Khenra Rageblood
card.rules: Haste Madness R (If you discard this card, discard it into exile. When you do, cast it for its madness cost or put it into your graveyard.)
card.flavor: The jackalfolk of the plane do not fear their frenzy state; if they lose control, it mustâ€™ve been for a good reason, so they say.

card.name: Launch Force
card.rules: Target creature you control deals damage equal to its power to any other target. Then sacrifice it. If the sacrificed creatureâ€™s power was 4 or greater, exile the top card of your library. Until the end of your next turn, you may play that card.

card.name: Lightning Chestplate
card.rules: Husk (When this enters, create a 2/2 black Zombie creature token with decayed, then attach this to it. A creature with decayed canâ€™t block. When it attacks, sacrifice it at end of combat.) Equipped creature gets +3/+0 and has trample and haste. Equip 5

card.name: Mage of the Broken Lands
card.rules: When this creature enters, you may discard a card. If you do, draw a card. 4, Exile a land card from your graveyard: Mage of the Broken Lands deals 1 damage to each opponent.
card.flavor: The ones who settle in the wastes have a term for city-living folk: â€œthin-skinned.â€

card.name: Palace Gate Pilgrim
card.rules: When this creature enters while youâ€™re divine or you become divine for the first time, exile the top card of your library. You may play that card until the end of your next turn. Divinity (WUBRG: You become divine for the rest of the game. Activate only as a sorcery.)

card.name: Preacher of Abandon
card.rules: Wardâ€”Pay 2 life. (Whenever this creature becomes the target of a spell or ability an opponent controls, counter it unless that player pays 2 life.) 2, Sacrifice a permanent: This creature gets +2/+2 until end of turn.
card.flavor: â€œIgnore the silly dreams of the sheltered priests; the only afterlife we need is now.â€

card.name: Ravages of Khnum
card.rules: Ravages of Khnum deals X damage to target creature or planeswalker. Excess damage is dealt to that permanentâ€™s controller instead. Cycling R (R, Discard this card: Draw a card.)
card.flavor: The degenerate images of the old gods lay waste to the city of the faithful and threatened their hope.

card.name: Raze Wraps
card.rules: Raze Wraps deals 2 damage to target creature. If itâ€™s a Zombie, Raze Wraps also deals 2 damage to that creatureâ€™s controller.
card.flavor: Flame carries on farther and faster than the written word can.

card.name: Torturerâ€™s Device
card.rules: Defender 1R, T: Torturerâ€™s Device deals 1 damage to target opponent. Cycling R (R, Discard this card: Draw a card.) When you cycle Torturerâ€™s Device, it deals 1 damage to target opponent.

card.name: Unceasing Devotion
card.rules: Whenever an equipped or enchanted creature you control dies, exile the top card of your library. Until the end of your next turn, you may play that card. Cycling 1R (1R, Discard this card: Draw a card.)
card.flavor: While there were no trials to guide them, the young of Naktamun prepared regardless for combat.

card.name: Alleyway Prophet
card.rules: Whenever you cast a multicolored spell, create a 1/1 green and white Human Cleric creature token with â€œT: Add two mana in any combination of colors. Spend this mana only to activate abilities.â€ If youâ€™re divine, create two of those tokens instead. Divinity (WUBRG: You become divine for the rest of the game. Activate only as a sorcery.)

card.name: Battleworn Mastodon
card.rules: Whenever this creature attacks, you may put a stun counter on it. When you do, target creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn. When this creature dies, draw a card for each creature you control with a stun counter on it.
card.flavor: Once thought endangered, the mastodon population rebounded after being set free from the trial chambers to see sunlight for the first time.

card.name: Bring Aground
card.rules: Bring Aground deals 5 damage to target creature with flying. Cycling 1G (1G, Discard this card: Draw a card.)
card.flavor: After years of dealing with drakes, a few locusts were no issue.

card.name: Capturer Recluse
card.rules: Reach Whenever a creature dealt damage by this creature this turn dies, reveal cards from the top of your library until you reveal a land card. Put that card into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order.

card.name: Cartouche of Triumph
card.rules: Enchant creature you control When this Aura enters, enchanted creature deals damage equal to its power to target creature or planeswalker you donâ€™t control. Enchanted creature gets +2/+2 and has trample.
card.flavor: To some, the cartouches were symbols of oppression. For other, they remained achievements to be coveted.

card.name: Deacon of the Dunes
card.rules: This creature gets +1/+1 for each Desert you control and each Desert card in your graveyard. As long as you control a creature with power 4 or greater, you may play an additional land on each of your turns, and you may play land cards from your graveyard.
card.flavor: The desert sphinxes sought to fill the desert with artificial life of great beauty.

card.name: Defend Khnum
card.rules: You may cast Defend Khnum as though it had flash if you pay 3 more to cast it. Untap each creature you control. They get +3/+3 and gain vigilance until end of turn. Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt this turn by Gods or Zombies.
card.flavor: â€œDo not fight to die; there is no glory in that. Survive to see a day where we of Amonkhet may live free!â€

card.name: Deliver to the Afterlife
card.rules: Target creature you control deals damage equal to its power to target creature or planeswalker you donâ€™t control. If that creature or planeswalker would die this turn, exile it instead.
card.flavor: â€œTrust the heart, trust the aim Light the match, feed the flameâ€

card.name: Devouring Sandwurm
card.rules: When this creature enters, you may put a trample counter on it. If you donâ€™t, you gain 4 life. Cycling 1G (1G, Discard this card: Draw a card.)
card.flavor: â€œThey say a sandwurm once fell through an Omenpath, and came out in two pieces!â€

card.name: Divine Congregation
card.rules: Create two 1/1 green and white Human Cleric creature tokens with â€œT: Add two mana in any combination of colors. Spend this mana only to activate abilities.â€
card.flavor: Once founded by a caravan of travelers, Khnum grew to be the most inhabited city of the wastes: a paradise for the faithful.

card.name: Faithful Terraforming
card.rules: Search your library for a card with a basic land type, put it onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle. As long as you control a Desert and this card is in your graveyard, it has Flashback 5G. (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)

card.name: Glass Shard Enveloper
card.rules: Trample, vigilance When this creature dies, up to one target creature you control becomes a copy of this creature.
card.flavor: Not all experiments with hyalamancy went smoothly, but they all went sharply.

card.name: Khenra Strike Team
card.rules: Whenever this creature attacks, you may put a stun counter on it. When you do, put a +1/+1 counter on each attacking creature you control thatâ€™s a Jackal or a Warrior.
card.flavor: Their feverish devotion blinded them to the violence that ensued at the walls of Khnum.

card.name: Naktamun Reformer
card.rules: T: Add one mana of any color. T, Put a stun counter on this creature: Add CC. (If a permanent with a stun counter would become untapped, remove one from it instead.)
card.flavor: â€œWhy go to Khnum and abandon my home? There is still work to be done here.â€

card.name: Nature-Call Minister
card.rules: Trample At the beginning of combat on your turn, if youâ€™re divine, put a +1/+1 counter on this creature. Divinity (WUBRG: You become divine for the rest of the game. Activate only as a sorcery.)

card.name: Nissa of the Beating Sands
card.rules: 1, T: Add one mana of any color. 2, T: Target creature gets +2/+2 until end of turn. Activate only as a sorcery. 3, T: Reveal the top card of your library. If itâ€™s a permanent card, put it into your hand. Otherwise, put it on the bottom of your library.

card.name: Nissaâ€™s Discovery
card.rules: Mill five cards. You may put a permanent card from among the cards milled this way into your hand.
card.flavor: Her mind raced as she read the inscription. How could she let on the secret to Chandra and the others without attracting Tezzeretâ€™s attention? What were his terrible intentions?

card.name: Oasislurker
card.rules: As long as youâ€™re divine, this creature gets +1/+1 and has trample. Divinity (WUBRG: You become divine for the rest of the game. Activate only as a sorcery.)
card.flavor: The healing properties of the oasis are not strictly beneficial for visiting travelers.

card.name: Order of Khnum
card.rules: When this creature enters, create a 1/1 green and white Human Cleric creature token with â€œT: Add two mana in any combination of colors. Spend this mana only to activate abilities.â€
card.flavor: The missionaries once hired to bring the initial settlers to Khnumâ€™s founding served as the first in a long order of devoted protectors.

card.name: Piercing Bellower
card.rules: Whenever this creature attacks, you may put a stun counter on it. If you do, it gets +2/+2 until end of turn. (If a permanent with a stun counter would become untapped, remove one from it instead.)
card.flavor: â€œLine â€˜em up for me, wonâ€™t you!â€

card.name: Protector of Khnum
card.rules: Reach This creature gets +2/+2 as long as youâ€™re divine. Divinity (WUBRG: You become divine for the rest of the game. Activate only as a sorcery.)
card.flavor: â€œMy aim is as sure as my faith.â€

card.name: Queen of the Swarm
card.rules: When this creature enters, exile target playerâ€™s graveyard. For each land card exiled this way, create a 1/1 green Insect creature token. Whenever an Insect you control dies, put two +1/+1 counters on this creature.
card.flavor: â€œI can handle the zombies, the sandstorms, even the murderous crocodiles. But giant beetles?â€

card.name: Reticent Peacekeeper
card.rules: Defender As long as youâ€™re divine, this creature has vigilance and can attack as though it didnâ€™t have defender. Divinity (WUBRG: You become divine for the rest of the game. Activate only as a sorcery.)

card.name: Rhonasâ€™ Might
card.rules: Consecrate 3GG (You may cast this spell by sacrificing a creature and paying its Consecrate cost reduced by that creatureâ€™s power. If you do, put this spell onto the battlefield transformed as it resolves.) Target creature you control gets +2/+2 until end of turn. It fights target creature an opponent controls.

card.name: Sanctifier of Dust
card.rules: When this creature dies, you gain 2 life. If you control a Desert or thereâ€™s a Desert card in your graveyard, instead you gain 4 life.
card.flavor: While others recoil from it, the naga embrace the sand.

card.name: Scarab Shepherd
card.rules: 3: Create a 1/1 green Insect creature token with deathtouch and â€œThis creature canâ€™t attack or block unless youâ€™re divine.â€ Activate only as a sorcery. Divinity (WUBRG: You become divine for the rest of the game. Activate only as a sorcery.)

card.name: Zalikiâ€™s Divine Protection
card.rules: Target creature gets +1/+1 and gains indestructible until end of turn. Cycling 1G (1G, Discard this card: Draw a card.)
card.flavor: Many denied he ever existed, but none denied the power bestowed by belief in his infinite capacity for life and courage.

card.name: Alberius the Sand Caller
card.rules: Deserts you control have â€œT, Pay 1 life: Add one mana of any color.â€ As long as youâ€™re divine, creatures you control get +1/+1 and have vigilance. Divinity (WUBRG: You become divine for the rest of the game. Activate only as a sorcery.)

card.name: Anep, of Tattered Bonds
card.rules: Trample Other Warriors you control have trample. Whenever Anep or another creature you control with power 4 or greater attacks, you may put a stun counter on it. If you do, double its power until end of turn. (If a permanent with a stun counter would become untapped, remove one from it instead.)

card.name: Atemsis, of Sandstone
card.rules: Flying At the beginning of your end step, choose a card name, then reveal the top card of your library. If that card has the chosen name, draw a card. 1U, Return another artifact you control to its ownerâ€™s hand: Surveil 1. (Look at the top card of your library. You may put it into your graveyard.)
card.flavor: â€œFear not the Whisper of Sand; only the Touchâ€ â€” Inscription

card.name: Djeru, Resolute Recruiter
card.rules: Whenever you put a stun counter on a creature, create a 1/1 white Human Soldier creature token.
card.flavor: â€œThe troubles we faced unseating Bolas were just the beginning. A strong Naktamun lies on the shoulders of a restless people who nevertheless go on.â€

card.name: Epnokep, Vizier of Sands
card.rules: T: Add two mana in any combination of colors. Spend this mana only to activate abilities. Whenever a land enters under your control, if youâ€™re divine, draw a card. Divinity (WUBRG: You become divine for the rest of the game. Activate only as a sorcery.)

card.name: Eternal Reawakening
card.rules: Surveil 2, then exile a creature card from your graveyard. Create a token thatâ€™s a copy of it, except itâ€™s a 4/4 black Zombie with no mana cost in addition to its other types. Cycling WU (WU, Discard this card: Draw a card.)
card.flavor: â€œBolas led us astray, but not so far off the path.â€

card.name: Etha, Khnum Watchleader
card.rules: Flash Reach When Etha enters, each tapped creature you control gets +1/+1 until end of turn. Untap them.
card.flavor: â€œI saw where the path of the God-Pharaoh took us. No deity shall hold power over me again.â€

card.name: Firesky Drake
card.rules: This spell costs 2 less to cast for each card youâ€™ve discarded this turn. Flying, ward 1, haste (Whenever this creature becomes the target of a spell or ability an opponent controls, counter it unless that player pays 1.)
card.flavor: The ministers preached the proliferating drake roosts as a sign of their devoteesâ€™ success.

card.name: Gulfield, Cruel Heir
card.rules: Wardâ€”Discard a card, Pay 3 life. At the beginning of your upkeep, draw a card, then each player discards a card. Madness UBR (If you discard this card, discard it into exile. When you do, cast it for its madness cost or put it into your graveyard.)

card.name: Hero of Naktamun
card.rules: Flying Whenever a creature you control deals combat damage to an opponent, that player loses 1 life and you gain 1 life.
card.flavor: The ranks of the city were divided. Many wished for peace, but others believed in the lies espoused by Gulfield. The tide turned as former heroes from the Hours staked their allegiances.

card.name: Illicit Bargainer
card.rules: Whenever you sacrifice a permanent, up to one target creature gets -1/-1 until end of turn. If you controlled that creature and you havenâ€™t created a Treasure this turn, create a tapped Treasure token. (Itâ€™s an artifact with â€œT, Sacrifice this token: Add one mana of any color.â€)
card.flavor: Pretty baubles are worth their price in blood in the markets at the city outskirts.

card.name: Labor for the Departed
card.rules: When this enchantment enters the battlefield, create a 2/2 black Zombie creature token with decayed. (It canâ€™t block. When it attacks, sacrifice it at end of combat.) Whenever a Zombie you control dies during your turn, target opponent sacrifices a creature of their choice. This ability triggers only once each turn.
card.flavor: The pitiless dead toiled where few others would dare.

card.name: Nadu, Divine Strategist
card.rules: Flying Ward 2 (Whenever this creature becomes the target of a spell or ability an opponent controls, counter it unless that player pays 2.) Whenever you cast an instant or sorcery spell that targets only a single creature you control, copy that spell. You may choose new targets for the copy.

card.name: Plague of Locusts
card.rules: Consecrate 4UR (You may cast this spell by sacrificing a creature and paying its Consecrate cost reduced by that creatureâ€™s power. If you do, put this spell onto the battlefield transformed as it resolves.) Discard your hand, then draw that many cards plus one.

card.name: Plague of Scarabs
card.rules: Consecrate 4UB (You may cast this spell by sacrificing a creature and paying its Consecrate cost reduced by that creatureâ€™s power. If you do, put this spell onto the battlefield transformed as it resolves.) Surveil 2, then draw two cards. (To surveil 2, look at the top two cards of your library, then put any number of them into your graveyard and the rest on top of your library in any order.)

card.name: Plague of Scorpions
card.rules: Consecrate 4BR (You may cast this spell by sacrificing a creature and paying its Consecrate cost reduced by that creatureâ€™s power. If you do, put this spell onto the battlefield transformed as it resolves.) Each creature gets -3/-3 until end of turn.

card.name: Quicksand Vortex
card.rules: Flash When this enchantment enters, exile all creatures until this enchantment leaves the battlefield.
card.flavor: Previous attempts to receive Atemsisâ€™ wisdom were undone by conspicuously timed bouts of shifting sand that devoured entire caravans.

card.name: Resolute Bannerwing
card.rules: Flying At the beginning of combat on your turn, put a +1/+1 counter on target Warrior you control. Whenever you put one or more counters on a Warrior, Resolute Bannerwing deals that much damage to target player or planeswalker.
card.flavor: â€œWe fight as one!â€

card.name: Samut, Troubled Vizier
card.rules: First strike, vigilance, haste 2, T: Samut gains double strike until end of turn. 2, T: Untap another target creature. Put your choice of a +1/+1, first strike, vigilance, or haste counter on it.

card.name: Sokar, Soul Searcher
card.rules: Deathtouch Whenever Sokar attacks, mill three cards, then choose a permanent card in your graveyard. Return it to your hand if itâ€™s a land card or if youâ€™re divine. Divinity (WUBRG: You become divine for the rest of the game. Activate only as a sorcery.)

card.name: Suffer the Curse
card.rules: Destroy target nonland permanent. You lose X life, where X is that permanentâ€™s mana value reduced by the number of Deserts you control plus the number of Desert cards in your graveyard. Cycling 1BG (1BG, Discard this card: Draw a card.)

card.name: Vizier of Unity
card.rules: Whenever this creature or another nontoken Cleric you control enters, create a 2/2 black Zombie creature token with decayed. (It canâ€™t block. When it attacks, sacrifice it at end of combat.) Whenever you attack with three or more Zombies, target creature gains double strike until end of turn.

card.name: Vlyrim, Who Devourers
card.rules: Whenever Vlyrim or another Wurm you control attacks, you may mill cards equal to that creatureâ€™s power. When you do, Vlyim deals damage to any target equal to the number of land cards milled this way. 2G: Put any number of target land cards from your graveyard on top of your library.

card.name: Defiled Banner
card.rules: Husk (When this enters, create a 2/2 black Zombie creature token with decayed, then attach this to it. A creature with decayed canâ€™t block. When it attacks, sacrifice it at end of combat.) Equipped creature gets +1/+1 and has â€œWhenever this creature attacks, each other creature that shares a creature type with it gets +1/+1 until end of turn.â€ Equip 2

card.name: Glittering Trinket
card.rules: When this artifact enters, draw a card. T: Add two mana in any combination of colors. Spend this mana only to activate abilities.
card.flavor: Unbeknownst to buyer or seller, the market outside Naktamun peddled a gym torn from the cartouche of the late Temmet.

card.name: Jockey Harness
card.rules: Husk (When this enters, create a 2/2 black Zombie creature token with decayed, then attach this to it. A creature with decayed canâ€™t block. When it attacks, sacrifice it at end of combat.) Equipped creature gets +1/+2. Equip 1

card.name: Oracleâ€™s Hideaway
card.rules: 1, T: Scry 1. Put a brick counter on this artifact. (To scry 1, look at the top card of your library. You may put that card on the bottom.) When there are three or more brick counters on this artifact, transform it.

card.name: Pyramid of the Living
card.rules: At the beginning of combat on your turn, you gain 1 life. If you are divine, put a brick counter on this artifact. When there are three or more brick counters on this artifact, transform it. Divinity (WUBRG: You become divine for the rest of the game. Activate only as a sorcery.)

card.name: Samutâ€™s Palace
card.rules: 1, T: Create a tapped 1/1 white Human Soldier creature token. Put a brick counter on this artifact. When there are three or more brick counters on this artifact, transform it.
card.flavor: A hair too humble, Samut at first rejected living at the glamorous palace.

card.name: Sand Pillar Sentinel
card.rules: Vigilance If a creature is attacking you and you control a Desert or there is a Desert card in your graveyard, you may cast Sand Pillar Sentinel as though it had flash.
card.flavor: Nissa questioned the half-dozen close calls the group experienced on their way to the wise Atsemis. Did she oppose seeking audience with her?

card.name: Sand Sled
card.rules: Trample At the beginning of combat on your turn, if youâ€™re divine, you may have this Vehicle become an artifact creature and gain haste until end of turn. Divinity (WUBRG: You become divine for the rest of the game. Activate only as a sorcery.) Crew 4

card.name: Sandstone Messenger
card.rules: When this creature enters, you may discard a card. When you do, search your library for a card with a basic land type, reveal it, then shuffle and put that card into your hand. As long as youâ€™re divine, this creature gets +0/+2. Divinity (WUBRG: You become divine for the rest of the game. Activate only as a sorcery.)

card.name: Shrine to Zaliki
card.rules: 2, T: Search your library for a card with a basic land type, put it into your hand, then shuffle. Put a brick counter on this artifact. When there are three or more brick counters on this artifact, transform it.
card.flavor: Buried under centuries of Bolasâ€™ occupation, the shrineâ€™s ancient bricks cracked under the flood of worshipers.

card.name: Atemsisâ€™ Oasis
card.rules: Atemsisâ€™ Oasis enters tapped with a stun counter on it. (If a permanent with a stun counter would become untapped, remove one from it instead.) T: Add one mana of any color. 3: Return this card from your graveyard to the battlefield.

card.name: Lands of Devastation
card.rules: (T: Add R.) This land enters tapped. 1R, T, Sacrifice this land, Discard a card: Draw a card.
card.flavor: â€œLife here is difficult, but the people persist. What motivates them so?â€ â€” Nissa

card.name: Lands of Eternity

card.flavor: â€œThe history here could be studied for generations without making a dent. How long can life go on?â€ â€” Nissa

card.name: Lands of Glory

card.flavor: â€œFor many here, to live and die by the sword is worth it by itself. How many more must die?â€ â€” Nissa

card.name: Lands of Promise
card.rules: (T: Add G.) This land enters tapped. 1G, T, Sacrifice this land: Distribute two +1/+1 counters among up to two target creatures you control. Activate only as a sorcery.
card.flavor: â€œWhat lies at the corner of the plane must be worth the many trials of the people. How far must they travel?â€ â€” Nissa

card.name: Lands of Reckoning
card.rules: (T: Add W.) This land enters tapped. 1W, T, Sacrifice this land: Tap target creature and put a stun counter on it. Activate only as a sorcery. (If a permanent with a stun counter would become untapped, remove one from it instead.)
card.flavor: â€œNo people are more punished than those, even by the floodplains themselves. What have they done to deserve this?â€ â€” Nissa

card.name: Shifting Sands

card.flavor: Terraforming is a precise science and, for now, an imprecise implementation.
